fosslab.title: THE FOSSLAB
fosslab.description: The Lab is where everything amFOSS happens. Situated on the ground floor of the engineering block (S013), this is where members convene after class hours everyday, connect with each other, and conduct all club-related activities like talks, meetings, and debates.

taskForces.title: TASK FORCES
taskForces.description: Units within amFOSS that support its student-run structure, while offering members ongoing opportunities to show off a variety of non-technical skills.

content.title: Graphics Processing Unit
content.description: A most phenomenal team of creatives who do all kinds of painstaking work, from creating posters for events to designing the best website ever.

content.title: Content Writing Team
content.description: The wordsmiths who carefully word social media posts, blogs, and any other written content (except for this one!)

content.title: News team
content.description: In charge of keeping track of the latest community updates, and compiling the annual newsletter.

content.title: Media team
content.description: The photographers, videographers, and editors who often capture the members at their finest moments.

content.title: Internal Events
content.description: Handles scheduling and coordinating internal events like FOSSTalks, OpenTalks, movie screenings, and amFOSS Play.

fosstalks.title: FOSSTalks
fosstalks.description: A weekly stage where two chosen members deliver a presentationâ€”on anything from the newest tech to pressing societal issues.

amfossplays.title: amFOSS Play
amfossplays.description: A weekly event for sports activities featuring a range of activities like marathons, football, badminton, and cricket.

documentary.title: Documentary
documentary.description: A thought-provoking documentary is screened, post which members discuss their perspectives and comment on each others ideas.

opentalks.title: OpenTalks
opentalks.description: A session where an external guest speaker gives a talk and shares their insights, expertise, or advice.

amfossbiosnight.title: amFOSS-bi0s Night
amfossbiosnight.description: An annual cultural celebration hosted with our sister club, bi0s. Features good food, music, art, and games, all produced by members themselves.

socialservice.title: Social service
socialservice.description: Engagement in disaster relief and clean-up drives in collaboration, as volunteers under the Mata Amritanandamayi Math NGO.
